c74object.name: min.sift~
c74object.digest: Remove a specific sample value and convert to float output
c74object.description: Remove a specific sample value and convert to float output. min.sift~ removes a specified sample value (typically zero) as well as repeated sample values from an input signal. It then converts the remaining samples to floating-point output at control rate.

objarg.name: value
objarg.digest: Initial value to sift out from the incoming signal
objarg.description: Initial value to sift out from the incoming signal.

attribute.name: high_priority
attribute.digest: Deliver results in the high-priority scheduler thread
attribute.description: Deliver results in the high-priority scheduler thread. If set to false then deliver results in the main thread.

attribute.name: value
attribute.digest: Value to sift out of the incoming signal
attribute.description: Value to sift out of the incoming signal.
